input.sentences: he intended to do all the cooking himself .
but after awhile he gave up and enlisted the help of friends .
he was n't familiar with all the local cuisine and he wanted the food the be authentic .

output.sentences: Tonight I hosted a dinner party for a few close friends
The kitchen was cramped but everyone helped
